name: Wizards vs Demons: The arcade
description:
Demons invade the village of wizards.

 You control 4 wizards, but only one at a time. With A,S,D,F you choose the mage you want to control to dodge the demons attack. You just have to endure the demonic siege for 60 seconds. Collecting all the coins you can to score points. Keeping all the wizards alive multiplies your points. Can you face the demons? How many points can you collect in the process?

(Space for restart)
